channel.title: CVE Feed for Brizy.io -- Brizy - Page Builder
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Brizy.io -- Brizy - Page Builder

item.title: CVE-2021-38345|2024-09-17T00:05:36.560Z -- brizy.io -- brizy%20-%20page%20builder
item.description: The Brizy Page Builder plugin <= 2.3.11 for WordPress used an incorrect authorization check that allowed any logged-in user accessing any endpoint in the wp-admin directory to modify the content of any existing post or page created with the Brizy editor. An identical issue was found by another researcher in Brizy <= 1.0.125 and fixed in version 1.0.126, but the vulnerability was reintroduced in version 1.0.127.
